capstone.gui

Class Note.MidiInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • capstone.gui.Note.MidiInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    Note

    private class Note.MidiInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Private class containing note information for MIDI service.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private int duration
      The duration of the note
      private int instrument
      The instrument that the note uses
      private int pitch
      The note's pitch value
      private boolean rest
      If this note is a rest
      private int volume
      The volume of the note

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      MidiInfo(int pitch, int volume, int duration, int instrument, boolean rest)
      Creates a new MIDI information object with the given pitch, volume, duration, instrument, and rest values.

      • MidiInfo

        public MidiInfo(int pitch,
                int volume,
                int duration,
                int instrument,
                boolean rest)
        Creates a new MIDI information object with the given pitch, volume, duration, instrument, and rest values.
        Parameters:
        pitch - this note's pitch value
        volume - the volume of the note
        duration - the duration of the note
        instrument - the instrument that the note uses
        rest - if this note is a rest
